value.stringValue: The tth_IP_Booking_Create_Custom_Activity-1 invocable process failed to start because no records in your org match the record Id specified. In the entities that invoke tth_IP_Booking_Create_Custom_Activity-1, such as other processes, check the value for this input: SObjectId.

The tth_IP_Booking_Create_Custom_Activity-1 invocable process failed to start because a valid value wasn't found. This can happen when entities that invoke tth_IP_Booking_Create_Custom_Activity-1, such as other processes, don't have values for either the SObject or SObjectId. For example: -An SObject or SObject ID wasn't specified. -A value might have been included, but it was null at runtime.

Flow.description: Creates a Custom Activity record when a booking record is created/updated. This is used to populate the Trip Itinerary
Flow.label: tth IP:Booking-Create Custom Activity
